DOC.brief_summary: The objective study investigate clinical outcome follow single versus dual stenting strategy treatment true bifurcation distal leave main coronary artery lesion .
DOC.brief_title: The European Bifurcation Club Left Main Study
DOC.criteria: Patients must meet ALL inclusion criterion : Bifurcation distal leave main stem stenosis > 50 % Ischaemic symptom , Positive noninvasive imaging ischaemia , Positive FFR , LMS IVUS MLA < 6mm2 Left main diameter ≤5.75mm True bifurcation lesion type 1,1,1 0,1,1 LAD Cx diameter > 2.75mm Unprotected leave main Patient ≥18 year old STEMI < 72 hour precede Cardiogenic shock Chronic total occlusion either vessel > 2 coronary lesion plan treatment SYNTAX score plan lesion treat > 32 LMS trifurcation vessel ≥2.75mm diameter Either bifurcation vessel suitable stenting Platelet count ≤50 x 10^9/mm3 Left ventricular ejection fraction ≤20 % Patient life expectancy le 12 month Participation another investigational drug device study Patient unable give inform consent Women childbearing potential lactating
